title: Add Customer: "Reset" button resets clears all fields and error messages
steps_actions:
1. Click "Add Customer" button
2. Input any numbers in "FirstName"
3. Input any special characters in "LastName"
4. Input any numbers in "Email"
5. Input any special character in "Address"
6. Input any symbol in "Mobile number"
7. Click "Reset" button
steps_result:
1. https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. "Numbers are not allowed" error message occurs
3. "Special characters are not allowed" error message occurs
4. "Email-ID is not valid" error message occurs
5. "Special characters are not allowed" error message occurs
6. "Characters are not allowed" error message occurs
7. All data reset and no error messages are shown

title: Add Customer: Submit button - valid
steps_actions:
1. Click on "Add Customer" button
2. Input valid "FirstName"
3. Input valid "LastName"
4. Input valid "Email"
5. Input valid "Address"
6. Input valid "Mobile Number"
7. Click "Submit" button
steps_result:
1. https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. No error message is shown
3. No error message is shown
4. No error message is shown
5. No error message is shown
6. No error message is shown
7. New page with Customer ID, "Please Note Down Your Customer ID" message and "Home" button are shown. "Home" returns user to main page https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/index.html

title: Add Customer: Submit button - invalid
steps_actions:
1. Click on "Add Customer" button
2. Input cyrillic "FirstName"
3. Input valid "LastName"
4. Input valid "Email"
5. Input valid "Address"
6. Input valid "Mobile Number"
7. Click "Submit" button
steps_result:
1. https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. "Cyrillic are not allowed" error message is shown
3. No error message is shown
4. No error message is shown
5. No error message is shown
6. No error message is shown
7. New customer is not created, "Please fill all fields" message is shown

title: Add Customer: Active field color
steps_actions:
1. Click "Add Customer" button
2. Click on "FirstName" field
3. Click on "LastName" field
4. Click on "Email" field
5. Click on "Address" field
6. Click on "Mobile number" field
steps_result:
1. New page https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. "FirstName" field is glowing blue
3. "LastName" field is glowing blue
4. "Email" field is glowing blue
5. "Address" field is glowing blue
6. "Mobile number" field is glowing blue

title: Add Customer: Placeholder inside fields
steps_actions:
1. Click "Add Customer" button
2. Leave "FirstName" field empty
3. Leave "LastName" field empty
4. Leave "Email" field empty
5. Leave "Address" field empty
6. Leave "Mobile number" field empty
steps_result:
1. New page https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. Placeholder "FirstName" inside "FirstName" field is shown
3. Placeholder "LastName" inside "LastName" field is shown
4. Placeholder "Email" inside "Email" field is shown
5. Placeholder "Address" inside "Address" field is shown
6. Placeholder "Mobile number" inside "Mobile number" field is shown

title: Add Customer: Clicking logo button resets the page
steps_actions:
1. Open "Add customer page"
2. Click at the logo "Guru99 telecom"
steps_result:
1. New page https://demo.guru99.com/telecom/addcustomer.php is opened
2. The page is refreshed
